howToPlay.title: How to Play?
howToPlay.subTitle: Master the controls and defeat the monsters

items.text: In single player, use the arrow keys to move and jump. Pick up weapons with the down arrow, shoot with Z, and switch weapons with X.

For two players, Player 1 uses W to jump, A/S to move, S to pick up weapons, C to shoot, and V to switch weapons. Player 2 uses the arrow keys for movement and jumping, down arrow to pick up weapons, K to shoot, and L to switch weapons.
Defeat all monsters in Campaign mode to escape the temple, or survive for as long as possible in Endless mode.
Collect new weapons and strategically switch them to take down more powerful enemies.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subTitle: Common questions about Temple of Boom

items.question: What is the objective of Temple of Boom?
items.answer: In Temple of Boom, the goal is to defeat waves of monsters and survive to escape the temple in Campaign mode, or stay alive as long as possible in Endless mode.

items.question: Can I play Temple of Boom with a friend?
items.answer: Yes, Temple of Boom offers a two-player mode where you can team up or compete with a friend on the same device.

items.question: How do I switch weapons?
items.answer: In single-player mode, use the X key to switch weapons. In two-player mode, Player 1 uses the V key, and Player 2 uses the L key.

items.question: Who created Temple of Boom?
items.answer: Temple of Boom was developed by Colin Lane Games, a one-man studio based in Stockholm, Sweden, known for hit games like Dunkers, Wrassling, and Big Shot Boxing.
